title: Lincoln Memorial: Contact Public Affairs
body: Contact Public Affairs       The Lincoln Memorial is administered by National Mall and Memorial Parks.         Contact Public Affairs  Contact the Public Affairs office by email or by calling 202-245-4676.  General Visitor Inquiries For general visitor questions, email, call 202-246-6841, or write to: National Mall and Memorial Parks 900 Ohio Drive, SW Washington, DC 20024           Press Releases and Media Advisories Check out our News Releases page to get the latest information straight from the source.          Social Media Follow along and share your story @NationalMallNPS #NationalMall Twitter Facebook YouTube
